name: Great Value: 100% Extra Virgin Olive Oil, 25.5 oz

reviews.name: Great Value: 100% Extra Virgin Olive Oil, 25.5 oz
reviews.reviewText: The flavor is good. I now use olive oil in over 90 pct. of any oils that are needed in cooking. It even holds up for dipping breads with it. I use it for popping corn on the stove (much preferred to microwave for me). Try it. The cost is very reasonable for the amount of oil you get.
reviews.title: The Title Says it all.

reviews.name: Great Value: 100% Extra Virgin Olive Oil, 25.5 oz
reviews.reviewText: I use olive oil all the time for health benefits. This is the first time I have used the Great Value and value it is and taste just as good as the real expensive kind I will be buying this all the time. Delicate flavor.
reviews.title: Great buy

reviews.name: Great Value: 100% Extra Virgin Olive Oil, 25.5 oz
reviews.reviewText: Not as good as the very expensive oil, but better than most store brand ones. I use it for everything except salads.
reviews.title: very good

reviews.name: Great Value: 100% Extra Virgin Olive Oil, 25.5 oz
reviews.reviewText: This same product is also made for Food Lion and is much much more expensive at Food Lion. The smaller bottles at Food Lion are priced higher that this larger Great Value brand but it is the same.
reviews.title: Great product

reviews.name: Great Value: 100% Extra Virgin Olive Oil, 25.5 oz
reviews.reviewText: Just can't beat the value for this quality Olive Oil. Much more expensive in the super markets. Highly recommended!
reviews.title: Great Olive Oil...good taste!
